mapper.select: select NAME, BCNO, CNAME, CPOSI, CADDR, MTEL, TEL, FAX, EMAIL, HOMEPAGE, IMG from bizcard where MNO = #{mno} order by NAME
mapper.insert: insert into bizcard(MNO, BCN, NAME, CNAME, CPOSI, CADDR, MTEL, TEL, FAX, EMAIL, HOMEPAGE, PCARD, IMG) values(#{mno}, #{bcn}, #{name}, #{cname}, #{cposi}, #{caddr}, #{mtel}, #{tel}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{homepage}, #{pcard}, #{img})
mapper.select: select NAME, BCNO, CNAME, CPOSI, CADDR, MTEL, TEL, FAX, EMAIL, HOMEPAGE, IMG from bizcard where BCNO = #{cardNo} and MNO = #{mno}
mapper.delete: delete from bizcard where MNO = #{mno} and BCNO = #{bcno}
